T02TD1257E:280a-1: pra ti shtha bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD1257E:280a-3: rab gnas kyi cho ga'i tshul zhes bya ba /
T02TD1257E:280a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1257E:280a-5: nges pa'i tshig dang rnam par dbye ba dang /
T02TD1257E:280a-6: cho ga rim par phye ste rab gnas bshad //
T02TD1257E:280a-7: de la dang por nges pa'i tshig ni pra ka sha na n'a di pra ti shtha zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1257E:280a-8: mchog tu gnas pas rab gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD1257E:280a-9: de yang yun ring bas mchog dang //
T02TD1257E:280a-10: khyad par du gyur pas mchog go //
T02TD1257E:280a-11: de la yun ring ba ni mchog thams cad do //
T02TD1257E:280a-12: khyad par du gyur pa ni mchog gnas thams cad de /
T02TD1257E:280a-13: ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1257E:280a-14: rnam par dbye ba la gnyis te /
T02TD1257E:280a-15: gzhis rnam par dbye ba dang /
T02TD1257E:280a-16: cho ga rnam par dbye ba'o //
T02TD1257E:280a-17: de la gzhis rnam par dbye ba la gsum ste /
T02TD1257E:280a-18: sku'i bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba dang /
T02TD1257E:280a-19: gsung gi bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba dang /
T02TD1257E:280a-20: thugs kyi bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba'o //
T02TD1257E:280a-21: de la sku'i bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba ni mchod rten dang /
T02TD1257E:280b-7: gsung gi bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba ni phreng ba dang /
T02TD1257E:280b-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i glegs bam rnams so //
T02TD1257E:280b-10: rigs so so'i bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba ni sku gzugs rnams rang rang gi sku gang yin pa de nyid du rab gnas bya'o //
T02TD1257E:280b-11: cho ga rnam par dbye ba ni cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02TD1257E:280b-13: da ni cho ga rim par phye ste bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1257E:280b-14: de la rab gnas byed pa'i slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1257E:280b-18: rgyu skar shis pa la bya ste /
T02TD1257E:280b-20: zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang //
T02TD1257E:280b-21: rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin dang //
T02TD1257E:280b-22: tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid la //
T02TD1257E:280b-23: rgyal ba'i rab gnas la sogs nyid //
T02TD1257E:280b-25: dus de dag la gnas yid du 'ong bar //
T02TD1257E:280b-26: bla re dang yol ba dang 'phan la sogs pas brgyan cing me tog bkram ste /
T02TD1257E:280b-28: gnas der stegs bu khru do ba /
T02TD1257E:280b-30: gru bzhi lham pa mdzes pa /
T02TD1257E:280b-31: 'jam pa zur bzhi ya yo med pa gcig byas te /
T02TD1257E:280b-35: rdo thal gyis dkar por byug go //
T02TD1257E:280b-36: stegs bu de'i steng du rab gnas bya ba'i lha la khrus gsol ba dang /
T02TD1257E:280b-37: mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD1257E:280b-38: de la cho ga'i rim pa ni dang por stegs bu'i steng du sku gzugs zhal shar du bltas pa bzhugs pa la /
T02TD1257E:280b-39: ras ser po sku la gsol te /
T02TD1257E:280b-40: aom badzra wasta h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis so //
T02TD1257E:280b-41: de nas h'um zhes bzlas pa'i yungs kar chu'i shis pa de /
T02TD1257E:280b-42: lan gsum du g-yas g-yon nas bskor te /
T02TD1257E:280b-43: me ru dor te nges par sbyang ngo //
T02TD1257E:280b-44: de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02TD1257E:280b-45: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i kham phor bzhag la /
T02TD1257E:280b-46: d'ur ba'i pir gyis blang zhing sngags 'dis bkru'o //
T02TD1257E:280b-47: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1257E:280b-48: de nas dag par gyur pa na /
T02TD1257E:280b-49: til mar dri zhim pos bsgos pa khar ba'i snod du bzhag la /
T02TD1257E:280b-50: d'ur ba'i pir gyis blang zhing /
T02TD1257E:281a-1: bzlas pas sku khyab par legs par byugs te /
T02TD1257E:281a-2: aom h'um tram hr'i: kham zhes pas so //
T02TD1257E:281a-3: de nas til mar bsal ba'i phyir /
T02TD1257E:281a-4: shun lpags lnga po'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'i chus bkru'o //
T02TD1257E:281a-5: de nas yang aa ma ka la sogs pa'i 'dag chal gyi lde gus byugs la /
T02TD1257E:281a-6: bum pa chu gtsang ma bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar bas dbang bskur ba'i khrus gsol te /
T02TD1257E:281a-7: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing dril bu gsil te /
T02TD1257E:281a-8: glu gar dang rol mo sil snyan du ma sgrogs shing chu bum pas blugs so //
T02TD1257E:281a-9: de'i tshe slob dpon gyis nam mkha' la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1257E:281a-11: lha dang lha mo mang pos kyang bdud rtsi'i chu blugs par bsams la /
T02TD1257E:281a-12: tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas pas sngags 'di brjod cing dbang bskur te khrus bya'o //
T02TD1257E:281a-13: ji ltar blta mas pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD1257E:281a-14: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba //
T02TD1257E:281a-15: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1257E:281a-16: de ltar bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02TD1257E:281a-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shr'i h'um /
T02TD1257E:281a-19: de nas ras dmar pos sku la chags pa'i chu legs par phyis te /
T02TD1257E:281a-21: de nas tsandan gnyis dang gur kum dang la gu dang skran de ka te /
T02TD1257E:281a-22: dri'i lde gus lha'i thugs kar byugs te /
T02TD1257E:281a-24: aom badzra gandhe a'a: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1257E:281a-25: de nas me tog dang spos dang /
T02TD1257E:281a-26: mar me dang dri chab dang /
T02TD1257E:281a-27: lha bshos rnams rang rang gi sngags kyis phul la /
T02TD1257E:281a-28: thugs ka dang mgur dang spyi bo dang /
T02TD1257E:281a-29: phrag pa rnams su rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pas lan gsum du reg la lag par bdug spos thogs la /
T02TD1257E:281a-30: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1257E:281a-31: lce h'um las rdo rjer byas te /
T02TD1257E:281a-32: sta gon la gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1257E:281a-33: 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1257E:281a-34: bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mo //
T02TD1257E:281a-35: rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1257E:281a-36: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD1257E:281a-37: khyed rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1257E:281a-38: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1257E:281a-39: sang ni rab gnas bgyid pa lags //
T02TD1257E:281b-0: gus pas bdag @281b dang dam la ni //
T02TD1257E:281b-1: bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad par rigs //
T02TD1257E:281b-3: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD1257E:281b-4: dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD1257E:281b-5: gang yang sngags kyi lha gzhan dang //
T02TD1257E:281b-6: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
T02TD1257E:281b-7: bstan pa la ni mngon dga' zhing //
T02TD1257E:281b-8: byang chub sems la rten 'byung la //
T02TD1257E:281b-9: rdo rje'i spyan ldan sems can gzhan //
T02TD1257E:281b-10: rdo rje 'chang chen cho ga bdag / rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yi ni //
T02TD1257E:281b-11: ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang //
T02TD1257E:281b-12: 'gro ba zhi phyir rab gnas bgyid //
T02TD1257E:281b-13: slob ma mchog dang bdag la ni //
T02TD1257E:281b-14: khyod kyis thugs brtses nyer bzung nas //
T02TD1257E:281b-15: rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis //
T02TD1257E:281b-16: thugs brtser ldan pas gnang par mdzod //
T02TD1257E:281b-17: de skad ces brjod pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad rab gnas kyi gnas de'i nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo ;
T02TD1257E:281b-18: / de nas rab gnas bya ba'i gzhi ste /
T02TD1257E:281b-19: stong pa nyid du bsgoms la padma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rigs kyis sam /
T02TD1257E:281b-20: yang na yig 'bru las yud tsam gyis lhar bskyed do //
T02TD1257E:281b-21: de nas rang gi snying gar 'od zer byung bas //
T02TD1257E:281b-22: ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste //
T02TD1257E:281b-23: mdun du byon par bsams la /
T02TD1257E:281b-24: aom pra t'i tstsha aa rgham h'um zhes pas yon chab dbul te /
T02TD1257E:281b-25: aom ni ri ti h'um kham zhes pas zhal bsil dbul lo //
T02TD1257E:281b-26: aom sarbba sam sho dha ni h'um phat ces pas zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02TD1257E:281b-30: dril bu'i sgra dag phul la /
T02TD1257E:281b-32: zhes pas dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims te dbang bskur la rgyas gdab ste /
T02TD1257E:281b-36: dri dang bshos dang sil snyan rnams phul la /
T02TD1257E:281b-37: lha de'i sngags mang du bzlas te /
T02TD1257E:281b-38: de nas yi ge brgya pa mu: dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1257E:281b-39: 'di ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1257E:281b-40: de nas nang par stegs bu'i gnas der mchod pa ci 'byor pa dang /
T02TD1257E:281b-41: gser gyi thur ma aa nydza na dang bcas pa bshams la rab tu gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1257E:282a-0: de yang dang por slob dpon gyi lag @282a * //
T02TD1257E:282a-2: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
T02TD1257E:282a-3: lce h'um las rdo rjer byas te /
T02TD1257E:282a-5: thugs brtser ldan zhes pa nas /
T02TD1257E:282a-6: gnang bar mdzod ces pa'i bar du brjod pas lha rnams bskul te /
T02TD1257E:282a-7: de yang sang ni zhes pa'i skabs su de ring zhes pa sbyar la /
T02TD1257E:282a-8: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02TD1257E:282a-9: yon chab dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs phul la lha thams cad kyi sku gzugs la bstims te /
T02TD1257E:282a-11: aom badzra a'a bha ra na wa pu sha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1257E:282a-12: zhes pas rgyan ci 'byor pa yang 'bul lo //
T02TD1257E:282a-13: de nas bstod pa yang bya ste /
T02TD1257E:282a-14: gser gyi thur ma aa nydza na byugs pas spyan phye ste /
T02TD1257E:282a-16: aom tsa kshu sa manta tsa kshu bi sho dha ni badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1257E:282a-18: de nas di bya aa gne sa m'a dhi dhya na pra na ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1257E:282a-20: bza' ba bzang po cung zad cig zangs bur sku la gsol //
T02TD1257E:282a-21: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas shing /
T02TD1257E:282a-24: lag pa g-yas pa gcus pas rdo rje lan gsum du bskor te brtan par byas la /
T02TD1257E:282a-25: stegs bu'i steng du sku'i cha gsum pa'i khri la /
T02TD1257E:282a-26: ha cang yang ma 'dud pa dang /
T02TD1257E:282a-28: ma yo bar ci mdzes su pra ti shtha badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1257E:282a-30: de nas slob ma brjod pa ni //
T02TD1257E:282a-31: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
T02TD1257E:282a-32: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02TD1257E:282a-33: ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD1257E:282a-34: de ni ngas kyang byas gyur te //
T02TD1257E:282a-35: khyod kyis de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T02TD1257E:282a-36: ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis //
T02TD1257E:282a-37: slob mas kyang sku la ci 'byor ba phul la bstod par yang bya ste /
T02TD1257E:282a-38: lan du mar bskor ba bya ba'o //
T02TD1257E:282a-39: de nas slob dpon gyis gtor ma byin la /
T02TD1257E:282a-40: sku gzugs byin che zhing bkra shis pa dang /
T02TD1257E:282a-41: yun ring du bzhugs pa'i phyir chos skyong ba'i srung ma la gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD1257E:282a-42: 'byor pa de yod na zangs bur zas phul ba'i rjes la rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-0: // / rab gnas mdor bsdus pa ni sta gon la gnas pa mi bya @282b bar nyin gcig la khrus la sogs pa sngar smos pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-3: lder so la sogs pa la ni me long la khrus bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-4: lugs ma la sogs pa ni dngos su khrus bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-5: lha khang ni lha'i sku ji snyed pa de snyed la khrus bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-6: spyir dril te bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD1257E:282b-11: gtsug lag khang ni rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bo //
T02TD1257E:282b-12: chu mig dang khron pa la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad du rab gnas byas la /
T02TD1257E:282b-13: mjug de gyur pa las chu mig la sogs par rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-15: glegs bam dag ni 'od dpag med du bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-16: rab gnas kyi ched du dkyil 'khor 'dri na rab gnas gang byed pa'i lha de gtso bor bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-17: lha khang ngam sku mang du bzhugs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-18: gal te rab tu gnas pa ma byas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1257E:282b-19: sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas pas //
T02TD1257E:282b-20: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byed pa //
T02TD1257E:282b-21: sngags med pas ni thal ba la //
T02TD1257E:282b-22: sbyin sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med //
T02TD1257E:282b-23: ces pa ste ma byas pa'i nyes pa'o //
T02TD1257E:282b-24: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i tshul zab mo //
T02TD1257E:282b-25: pandi ta chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
